Appearance
From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

German

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Middle High German vorschunge, from Old High German forskunga, from Proto-West Germanic *forskungu, equivalent to forschen (“to research”) +‎ -ung.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /ˈfɔʁʃʊŋ/
  • Audio (Germany (Berlin)):(file)
  • Hyphenation: For‧schung

Noun

[edit]

Forschung f (genitive Forschung, plural Forschungen)

  1. research

Declension

[edit]
Declension of Forschung [feminine]
singular plural
indef. def. noun def. noun
nominative eine die Forschung die Forschungen
genitive einer der Forschung der Forschungen
dative einer der Forschung den Forschungen
accusative eine die Forschung die Forschungen
